fixes.name: Delta Down CAD OTR Parallel Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T CAD OTR Parallel] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: This is a row-level multiplication of two calculated fields without any aggregations or parameter references. Converted Tableau column references to the Power BI format 'TableName'[ColumnName] and preserved the original logic as a calculated column.
